--- title: "Non-Tariff Barrier Reporting" --- ## Understanding Non-Tariff Barriers (NTBs) Non-Tariff Barriers are obstacles to trade that are not in the form of a tariff. They can include: - Complex customs procedures - Technical regulations and standards - Sanitary and phytosanitary measures - Licensing requirements - Quotas Reporting and addressing NTBs is crucial for smooth cross-border trade operations. ## NTB Reporting Form If you encounter a non-tariff barrier, please report it using the form below: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'shiny' was built under R version 4.3.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} `
